DataDefinitions:  shr.test

EntryElement: TypeConstraintOnValueChild
BasedOn:      ComplexBase
Description:  "It is a simple element based on SimpleBase and specializing the value's child"
Value:        Complex
1..1          Complex.Simple is Simple2

Element:      ComplexBase
Value:        Complex

Element:        Complex
0..1            Simple
1..*            CodedFromValueSet

Element:        Simple
Value:          string

Element:        Simple2
BasedOn:        Simple
Value:          string

Element:        CodedFromValueSet
Value:          code from http://standardhealthrecord.org/test/vs/Coded
